author: amilas
msg: Fixed some bugs with the complex type restriction.
1. do not add the parent info when restriction is used
2. when processing the missing qnames the data should be obtained from the parent metainfo object

author: vamsic007
msg: GERONIMO-2647 Non-Geronimo servlet-api-2.4.jar being included in G1.2 build
o The jar is packaged in WEB-INF\lib dir due to the dependency on jasper-runtime
o Adding <scope>provided</scope> to the dependency prevents the packaging of servlet-api-2.4.jar
